pages.text: You already thought the moment you put the recipe on paper that this creation will be something special.$(br2)The combination of the power of $(thing)The End$(), $(thing)Redstone$() and $(thing)Magic$() gives it very strange properties.

Depending on the strength of the applied $(thing)redstone signal$(), this block takes on different properties:$(li)Without redstone, it is completely solid$(li)when a $(thing)redstone signal$() reaches it, it becomes transparent, almost like glass$(li)however, it reaches its most curious state when a redstone signal of full strength is applied...
To make it even stranger, the material seems to respond to the last applied signal alone, not the strongest.$(br2)Truly a curiosity from the End.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.test: With the smallest external influence in the form of blocks it falls back to the state of lowest energy.
